refnamediv.refpurpose: Sends noteon and noteoff messages to the MIDI OUT port.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Sends noteon and noteoff messages to the MIDI OUT port when triggered by a value different than zero.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Similar to midion, this opcode sends noteon and noteoff messages to the MIDI out port, but only when ktrig is non-zero. This opcode is can work together with the output of the trigger opcode.
